import { Alert, Button, Fieldset, Form, Label, TextInput, ValidationChecklist, ValidationItem } from '@trussworks/react-uswds'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import '@trussworks/react-uswds/lib/index.css' const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string() .required('Email is required') .email('Email is invalid'), password: Yup.string() .required('Password is required') .min(6, 'Password must be at least 6 characters') .max(40, 'Password must not exceed 40 characters') }); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); const LoginForm = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, reset, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(validationSchema) }); return (
or create an account {errors.email || errors.password ? Email is invalid Password must meet requirements : undefined}

{}} >

Forgot username?

Forgot password?

) } export default LoginForm;
